other_tests.findings: Several clots were identified in the bladder and removed; a mass, 3 to 4 cm in diameter, was seen in the dome of the bladder.
Microscopical examination showed a variably cellular proliferation of mesenchymal cells against an edematous background, typical of inflammatory pseudotumor.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A follow-up MRI scan showed a small (8-mm) area of residual tumor, which was subsequently excised completely by partial cystectomy.
